title: Commission Directive 83/577/EEC of 15 November 1983 amending Directive 83/201/EEC establishing exceptions from Council Directive 77/99/EEC for certain products which contain other foodstuffs and only a small percentage of meat or meat product
header:
COMMISSION  DIRECTIVE
of 15 November 1983
amending Directive 83/201/EEC establishing exceptions from Council Directive 77/99/EEC for certain products which contain other foodstuffs and only a small percentage of meat or meat product
(83/577/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 6 of Directive 83/201/EEC, '1 January 1984' is hereby replaced by '1 June 1984'.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 November 1983.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 26, 31. 1. 1977, p. 85.
(2) OJ No L 112, 28. 4. 1983, p. 28.
